General.Name: Zhejiang Sanmei Chemical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Sanmei Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of fluorochemical products. It offers hydrofluoric acid, fluorinated refrigerant, ODS substitute products, foaming agents, and etching materials. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuyi, China.
